patent.title: Electroacoustic transducing device
patent.abstract: An electroacoustic transducing device comprising: a magnetic circuit having a yoke, a magnet, and a pole piece; a vibration system having a diaphragm and a voice coil; and a frame which holds the magnetic circuit and the vibration system. The voice coil is placed in a magnetic gap, and has lead wires of the voice coil which are drawn out from the voice coil at positions which are remote from the diaphragm. Openings for air forming for forming slack portions in the lead wires are drawn out from the voice coil and are disposed in the frame. The lead wires are adequately subjected to the wire laying process, and the audio performance is prevented from being lowered.

patent.title: Photocurable resin composition and cured product thereof
patent.abstract: To provide a colored photocurable resin composition capable of forming a solder resist layer excellent in property of hiding defective appearance of a copper circuit attributed to tarnish by oxidation. The photocurable resin composition can be developed with a dilute alkali solution and comprises: (A) a carboxylic acid-containing resin; (B) a photopolymerization initiator; c a compound having two or more ethylenically unsaturated groups per molecule; and (D) a red colorant.

patent.title: Apparatus and method for transmitting uplink scheduling request in mobile communication system
patent.abstract: A method and apparatus for transmitting an uplink Scheduling Request (SR) are provided. The method includes, obtaining a SR subframe configuration by receiving signaling, and transmitting SR information to a Base Station (BS) by using physical resources of another non-SR channel for transmitting other uplink control information. By applying the present invention, the SR, ACKnowledgement/Non-ACKnowledgement (ACK/NACK) or Channel Quality Indicator (CQI) information is returned to a BS when low Constant Modulus (CM) characteristic of an uplink Component Carrier (CC) is ensured.

patent.title: Switching converter equipped with adaptive frequency control function
patent.abstract: A switching converter equipped with an adaptive frequency control function includes a switching unit, an inductor, an output capacitor, a zero crossing detector that receives a signal of the switching node and a signal of the output terminal, that are fed back, and detects whether or not an inductor current flowing through the inductor crosses a zero point, a DCM/CCM detector that outputs an operation section discrimination signal that discriminates a current operation section by dividing the current operation section into a discontinuous conduction mode (DCM) operation section and a continuous conduction mode (CCM) operation section according to a zero crossing detection signal output by the zero crossing detector, a variable oscillator that changes and outputs a clock frequency signal according to the operation section discrimination signal output by the DCM/CCM detector, and a controller that controls switching of switches constituting the switching unit according to the clock frequency signal output by the variable oscillator.

patent.title: Picker device having automatically adjustable pitch
patent.abstract: The present invention comprises: a picker assembly including a plurality of picker frames having operation guide parts respectively formed at the upper and lower sides of the rear thereof, a pitch guide shaft passing through the plurality of picker frames, and springs respectively provided at the top and bottom of the plurality of picker frames; a picker lifting/lowering device coupled to the rear portion of the picker assembly to lift/lower the entire picker assembly; and a pitch adjuster including a pitch-adjusting member, which comprises a plurality of adjusting links coupled to the operation guide parts so as to be rotatable and be liftable/lowerable so that the pitches of the plurality of picker frames are adjusted, and a plurality of lifting/lowering link members that are rotatably coupled to the lower portions of the plurality of adjusting links and that rotate the adjusting links during a lifting/lowering operation.

patent.title: Système de traitement de l'eau de ballast
patent.abstract: La présente invention concerne un système de traitement de l'eau de ballast qui comprend une centrifugeuse (100), un stérilisateur à ondes ultrasoniques (200) et un stérilisateur à rayons ultraviolets (300). La centrifugeuse (100) centrifuge les matières étrangères à gros grains de l'eau de ballast présentant une différence de densité. Le stérilisateur à ondes ultrasoniques (200) est préparé à l'extrémité arrière de la centrifugeuse (100) afin de réaliser la stérilisation par ondes ultrasoniques de l'eau de ballast passant par la centrifugeuse (100). Le stérilisateur à ondes ultrasoniques (200) comprend une conduite (210) destinée à la stérilisation de l'eau de ballast et des dispositifs d'irradiation ultrasonique (220) destinés à irradier des ondes ultrasoniques sur l'eau de ballast passant par la conduite afin de procéder à la stérilisation. Le stérilisateur à rayons ultraviolets (300) stérilise l'eau de ballast passant par le stérilisateur à ondes ultrasoniques (200) par l'irradiation de rayons ultraviolets. Le système de traitement de l'eau de ballast peut stériliser l'eau de ballast circulant dans les navires, de manière à empêcher la pollution par l'eau de mer due à l'échappement de l'eau de ballast et à améliorer la fiabilité d'utilisation.

patent.title: Estimation d'état de mobilité rsrp pour un dispositif cellulaire
patent.abstract: Generally discussed herein are systems and apparatuses that can implement a Mobility State Estimation (MSE) of a User Equipment (UE) and techniques for using the MSE algorithms. According to an example technique to determine the MSE of a UE can include determining, using the UE, a maximum Reference Signal Received Power (RSRP) within a cell, determining, using the UE, a minimum RSRP within the cell, determining, using the UE, a difference between the maximum and minimum RSRP, and determining, using the UE, an MSE of the UE as a function of the determined difference.

patent.title: 슬라이드 개폐장치 및 이를 구비한 휴대형 단말기
patent.abstract: La présente invention concerne un appareil d'ouverture / fermeture de coulisse capable de faire coulisser une deuxième unité d'un terminal portable et de faciliter la commodité d'usage dudit terminal portable, ainsi qu'un tel terminal portable doté de l'appareil d'ouverture / fermeture de coulisse. La présente invention comporte : un élément fixe qui est fixé à une première unité et configuré de façon à loger des axes de rotation sur ses deux côtés d'extrémités ; un élément tournant prévu pour recouvrir la face supérieure de l'élément fixe, des côtés d'extrémités inférieures de l'élément tournant pouvant pivoter via une liaison à l'élément tournant et les deux extrémités étant adaptées à un élément de guidage ; un élément mobile, pouvant être fixé à la deuxième unité en vue d'ouvrir / de fermer la deuxième unité en effectuant un mouvement de coulissement, ses deux extrémités étant insérées dans l'élément de guidage qui est solidaire de l'élément tournant ; un moyen élastique dont une extrémité est en liaison pivot avec l'une ou l'autre extrémité de l'élément mobile et dont l'autre extrémité est en liaison pivot avec l'élément tournant de façon à appliquer un effort élastique à l'élément mobile pendant le mouvement de coulissement de la deuxième unité le long de l'élément de guidage ; et un moyen tournant dont une extrémité est fixée à des faces inférieures des deux côtés de l'autre extrémité de l'élément fixe de façon à faire pivoter l'élément tournant en correspondance avec la rotation, en se verrouillant pendant le mouvement de coulissement ascendant de l'élément mobile le long de l'élément de guidage.

patent.title: 발열체와 그를 이용한 유체가열장치
patent.abstract: A heating element and fluid heating apparatus using the same are provided to form a heating film by depositing a nano power complex and prevent damage of heating film by high temperature. A heating element(4) comprises a frame(1), heating film(2) of metal composition, and electrode strap(3). The frame is made of quartz or ceramic. A heating film of metal composition is deposited in a film type on the outer surface of frame and has tins as a main component. An electrode tap is formed at both ends of heating film and connected to the power source. The frame is made of one of material among a quartz tube, ceramic tube, and enamel pottery pipe.

patent.title: 프리모션이 가능한 신발 물품
patent.abstract: 프리모션이 가능한 신발 물품은, 종방향에 대해 제공되는 하나의 중앙 축 및 중앙 축을 따라 제공되며 중앙 축을 중심으로 자유 회전이 가능하고 신발 물품의 갑피 저면에 결속되는 복수개의 바형 미드솔을 포함하며, 상기 바형 미드솔은 상호 이격되어 일 바형 미드솔의 회전이 다른 바형 미드솔에 전달되지 않을 수 있다.

patent.title: Procédé de relocalisation d'utilisateur déclenché par une passerelle de noeud local b
patent.abstract: L'invention concerne un procédé de relocalisation d'utilisateur déclenché par une passerelle de nœud local B (HGW) qui comprend les étapes suivantes : transmission, par la HGW, d'un message de demande de relocalisation au nœud local B (HNB)auquel un équipement utilisateur (UE) appartient; déclenchement, par la HGW, d'une procédure pour relocaliser l'UE sur un autre nœud B; et transmission, par la HGW, d'un message de réponse de relocalisation correspondant au message de demande de relocalisation à la HGW. L'invention permet de mettre en œuvre, dans un système HNB, une relocalisation d'UE déclenchée par une HGW pour de nouveaux scénarios. Ce schéma améliore l'interface Ui-h et facilite l'amélioration de la qualité de service des utilisateurs. En outre, l'invention permet de fournir à des utilisateurs des services continus selon différents scénarios. Ledit procédé est facile à mettre en œuvre et efficace pour améliorer la stabilité et la performance d'un système HNB.

patent.title: Statistical machine translation method using dependency forest
patent.abstract: The present invention relates to the use of a plurality of dependency trees in tree-based statistical machine translation and proposes a dependency forest to effectively process the plurality of dependency trees. The present invention can improve a translation capability by generating a translation rule and a dependency language model by using the dependency forest and applying the generated translation rule and dependency language model when a source language text is converted to a target language text.

patent.title: Method, user equipment and base station for transmitting uplink signals
patent.abstract: La présente invention concerne plusieurs procédés, équipements utilisateurs (UE) et stations de base permettant d'émettre des signaux de liaison montante. Après réception d'informations de commande de synchronisation de liaison montante, l'UE peut émettre un signal de liaison montante sur au moins une cellule non autorisée inactive. De plus, l'UE peut essayer d'émettre le signal de liaison montante sur de multiples ressources de signaux de liaison montante à l'intérieur d'une fenêtre d'émission de signal de liaison montante. En utilisant la présente invention, la probabilité d'émission des signaux de liaison montante peut être améliorée et un retard temporel de synchronisation de liaison montante peut être raccourci.

patent.title: Synchronisation de messages de signalisation
patent.abstract: L'invention concerne une technique destinée à prendre en charge une double connectivité. Selon l'invention, un équipement utilisateur (UE) peut recevoir un message de reconfiguration de commande de ressources radio (RRC) d'un macro noeud B évolué (MeNB). Le message de reconfiguration de RRC peut indiquer qu'une cellule secondaire associée à un noeud B évolué secondaire (SeNB) doit être ajoutée pour connexion à l'équipement utilisateur. L'équipement utilisateur peut terminer une procédure de reconfiguration de RRC pour ajouter la cellule secondaire. L'équipement utilisateur peut envoyer un préambule au SeNB indiquant qu'il a terminé la procédure de reconfiguration de RRC. L'équipement utilisateur peut communiquer des données avec le SeNB après envoi du préambule à ce dernier, l'équipement utilisateur prenant en charge une double connectivité avec le MeNB et le SeNB.

patent.title: Emergency evacuation safety structure for ship installation
patent.abstract: The present invention relates to an emergency evacuation safety facility structure for ship installation, allowing crews and passengers to be safely evacuated to a buoyant material disposed on the inner side of a frame disposed on both side surfaces of a ship when the ship collides with a rock, a culvert, or an offshore structure while sailing or anchored or when emergency situations such as grounding, fire occurrence, and gas explosion. Moreover, the emergency evacuation safety facility structure can delay a sinking speed of the ship through the buoyant material and safely protect the side surfaces of the ship from collision with the other ship. Furthermore, the ship does not need to be constructed as a double hull structure, having a problem in which technical defects are more likely to occur, construction is difficult, and construction costs increase, to prevent the sinking of the ship.

patent.title: Method and system supporting handover from macro Node B to home Node B
patent.abstract: A method for supporting handover from macro Node B to home Node B is proposed according present invention, comprising: informing, by a source radio network control node of a UE 1  the UE of configuration parameters of a cell to be measured and indicating the UE to report a unique ID of the measured cell; measuring, by the UE, a signal from the home Node B, and after reading the home Node B's unique ID from the home Node B's system information, reporting the measurement result to said source radio network control node of the UE, said measurement result including the home Node B's unique ID; and sending, by said source radio network control node, a message to a destination radio network control node of said home Node B specified by said unique ID, so that the destination radio network control node can establish radio bearer in the home Node B for the UE.

patent.title: Procédé de transmission sur un canal partagé en liaison montante physique et équipement utilisateur
patent.abstract: The present application discloses a PUSCH transmission method. In the method, a UE receives configuration information from a base station, wherein the configuration information configures the UE to operate in a TDD reconfiguration mode of operation. Under the TDD reconfiguration mode of operation, the UE changes TDD uplink/downlink configuration according to an indication of the base station. The UE determines a timing relationship from UL Grant to PUSCH, a timing relationship from PHICH to PUSCH, and a timing relationship from PUSCH to PHICH, and detects the UL grant and/or PHICH according to the determined timing relationships. The UE sends PUSCH data based on the determined timing relationships according to the detected UL grant and/or PHICH. The present application also discloses a user equipment. By using this application, the UE can perform transmission on the PUSCH normally under the TDD reconfiguration mode of operation, transmit as much data as possible on the PUSCH of uplink subframes in case that the TDD uplink/downlink configuration changes frequently, and continue as many synchronization HARQ processes of the uplink subframes as possible before and after the change of the TDD uplink/downlink configuration.

patent.title: Ballast water treatment system
patent.abstract: The present invention provides a ballast water treatment system, comprising a centrifugal separator, an ultrasonic sterilizer, and an ultraviolet sterilizer, wherein, the centrifugal separator is designed to separate large-particle of foreign matters from the ballast water by centrifugal separation by means of density difference; the ultrasonic sterilizer is arranged at the back of the centrifugal separator, and is designed to accomplish ultrasonic sterilization for the ballast water passing through the centrifugal separator; the ultrasonic sterilizer comprises a pipe that is used for sterilization of the ballast water and ultrasonic irradiation unit that perform ultrasonic irradiation for the ballast water passing through the pipe; the ultraviolet sterilizer accomplishes sterilization by means of ultraviolet irradiation for the ballast water passing through the ultrasonic sterilizer. The ballast water treatment system provided in the present invention can effectively accomplish sterilization for the ballast water that flows into the ballast tank of ship, and thereby prevent all kinds of pollution to seawater related with ballast water discharge, and greatly improve reliability of application.

patent.title: Method for configuring and transmitting key
patent.abstract: The present application discloses a method for configuring and transmitting a key, which includes that: a) a serving cell (PCell) of UE determines a key (KeNB) used by a SCell and transmits the KeNB to the SCell; and b) the PCell transmits configuration information for configuring the SCell to the UE after receiving a response message from the SCell, and receives a response message from the UE. Or, the method includes that: a SCell of UE transmits a cell key request to a MME and receives key information from the MME; and the SCell transmits the key information received from the MME to the UE, and receives a response message from the UE. By the present application, data of the SCell is transmitted after being encrypted, so as to avoid a case that the data is decoded by other users, and further guarantee the security of the data.

patent.title: Collecteur de poussière axial et dispositif collecteur de poussière de pré-traitement pour collecteur de poussière axial
patent.abstract: 본 발명은 축류형 집진기 및 축류형 집진기용 전처리장치에 관한 것이다. 본 발명의 목적은 유입되는 함진가스의 분진에 의한 막힘현상을 제거하고 집진효율 및 가동률을 높일 수 있는 축류식 집진기 및 축류형 집진기용 전처리장치를 제공하는 것이다. 이를 위해, 본 발명에 따른 축류형 집진기는 일단의 유입구와 타단의 유출구를 가지고 내부의 집진처리공간을 형성하며, 하방으로 개방되며 흐름방향을 따라 상호 이격되게 순차적으로 형성된 제1배출구 및 제2배출구를 갖는 하우징과, 상기 제1배출구와 상기 제2배출구 사이에 설치되어 상기 집진처리공간을 전방의 전처리부와 후방의 후처리부로 구획하는 구획부와, 상기 집진처리공간 내에 상기 유입구와 동일 축상에 배치되어 상기 전처리부와 상기 후처리부를 연결하는 전달관부와, 상기 전처리부에 설치되어 상기 유입구를 통해 유입되는 함진가스의 유동을 확산시키는 확산원추형상부와, 상기 확산원추형상부의 하류에 설치되어 함진가스의 유동을 상기 전달관부에 수렴시키는 수렴원추형상부를 포함하는 가스유동유니트를 갖는 것을 특징으로 한다. 이에 의하여 축류형 집진기는 전처리부만 탈착하여 사용할 수 있으며, 일체형으로도 사용이 가능하며, 정압손실이 작고 관리가 용이하며 집진효율이 높은 집진장치가 제공된다.

patent.title: Electroosmotic pump
patent.abstract: La présente invention concerne des pompes électro-osmotiques qui ne sont sujettes ni à l'usure mécanique ni à la déchirure mécanique, ne comportent aucun élément mobile et présentent des débits améliorés ainsi que des propriétés électriques améliorées. Le dépôt d'une couche atomique peut être pratiqué afin de préparer des pompes électro-osmotiques actives à modulation passive du potentiel zeta à deux bornes électriques. Des première, seconde, etc.. couches minces de matériau peuvent être introduites dans les pores avec un revêtement conforme s'étendant d'un côté à l'autre. Dans la pompe électro-osmotique passive à deux bornes électriques, le potentiel zeta des micropores ou des nanopores peut être régulé par le choix du matériau recouvrant les parois intérieures des pores. Dans une pompe électro-osmotique à modulation du potentiel zeta active à trois bornes électriques, le potentiel zeta peut également être régulé au moyen d'un champ électrique afin de moduler le potentiel zeta par l'intermédiaire d'une troisième électrode indépendante, ce qui permet d'obtenir une régulation active du potentiel zeta de surface au moyen de structures d'électrodes incorporées dans les micropores ou dans les nanopores. En outre, l'invention concerne des nanostructures coaxiales, des procédés permettant de réaliser des nanostructures coaxiales et des dispositifs comprenant ces nanostructures coaxiales.

patent.title: Recogedor completamente automático de fibra óptica
patent.abstract: La presente invención se refiere a un recogedor completamente automático de fibra óptica, conectado con el cortador de fibra óptica y compuesto por primera caja y segunda caja, entre ellos, la primera caja se compone de un primera cubierta inferior donde se colocan las fibras ópticas y una primera cubierta superior, esta última está conectada de forma pivotada en la parte superior de la primera cubierta inferior. En la primera cubierta superior y la primera cubierta inferior se instala un carrete superior y un carrete inferior correspondiente respectivamente, los cuales están conectados giratoriamente en los lados abiertos de la primera caja. La segunda caja se compone de una unidad giratoria, conjunto de transmisión y palanca del recogedor, los cuales están conectados de forma móvil en la segunda caja respectivamente, entre ellos, la unidad giratoria se conecta de forma fija con la tapa del cortador, el conjunto de transmisión se conecta de forma transmisible con la unidad giratoria, y funciona unidireccionalmente y se conecta de forma transmisible con el carrete inferior, y la palanca se conecta de forma móvil con la primera cubierta superior. Este recogedor se caracteriza por una alta relación de transmisión de los engranajes internos, permitiendo lograr las fibras enrolladas más largas, y un cuerpo principal más profundo para colocar más fibras usadas.

patent.title: 디플루오로메톡시 브릿지결합을 포함하는 액정 화합물, 조성물 및 이의 응용
patent.abstract:
본 발명은 화학식(Ⅰ)와 같은 구조의 액정 화합물에 관한 것으로, 상기 화학식에서 R은 H 및 치환되지 않거나 또는 하나 또는 복수의 H가 할로겐으로 치환된 탄소수 1 내지 12의 알킬 또는 알콕시로부터 선택되며; A 1 은 단일결합 또는 1,4-페닐렌으로부터 선택되고, 1,4-페닐렌 중의 H는 각각 독립적으로 하나 또는 복수의 할로겐으로 치환될 수 있으며; L 1  및 L 2 는 각각 독립적으로 H 또는 할로겐으로부터 선택되며; Z 1 은 단일결합 또는 -(CH 2 ) 2 -로부터 선택된다. 본 발명의 상기 화합물은 회전점도가 낮고, 유전율 이방성이 크고, 상용성이 좋고, 물성이 안정적인 특징을 가지며, 조성물에 응용되면 소자의 구동 전압을 낮출 수 있어 광범위한 응용 전망이 있다.  
   
(I)

patent.title: Atome artificiel à base de bobines pour des métamatériaux, métamatériau comportant l'atome artificiel, et dispositif comportant le métamatériau
patent.abstract: 메타물질의 코일 기반 인공원자 및 이를 포함한 메타물질 및 소자를 제공한다. 본 메타물질의 코일 기반 인공원자는 제1 공간을 코일링하는 제1 코일링부 및 제2 공간을 코일링하며, 상기 제1 코일링부와 연결된 제2 코일링부를 포함한다.

verification.reproduction_query: SELECT DISTINCT             p.publication_number,             p.family_id,             ARRAY_AGG(DISTINCT t.text IGNORE NULLS) as title,             ARRAY_AGG(DISTINCT a.text IGNORE NULLS) as abstract,             p.filing_date,             p.publication_date,             p.inventor_harmonized,             p.assignee_harmonized,             p.cpc         FROM             `patents-public-data.patents.publications` p,             UNNEST(p.title_localized) as t,             UNNEST(p.abstract_localized) as a,             UNNEST(p.assignee_harmonized) as assignee_cn,             UNNEST(p.assignee_harmonized) as assignee_target         WHERE             p.publication_date >= 20000101             AND assignee_cn.country_code = 'CN'             AND assignee_target.country_code = 'KR'             AND assignee_cn != assignee_target         GROUP BY             p.publication_number,             p.family_id,             p.filing_date,             p.publication_date,             p.inventor_harmonized,             p.assignee_harmonized,             p.cpc         LIMIT 50

patent.title: Novel method of preparing secondary amine compound using microflow reactor
patent.abstract: Disclosed is a novel method of preparing a secondary amine compound using a microflow reactor. According to the method, a primary amine compound and a halide compound are allowed to react with each other in the microflow reactor, such that the production of a tertiary amine compound or an ammonium salt is minimized, whereby the secondary amine compound is efficiently prepared.

patent.title: 황열 바이러스 유래 ns1 단백질, 이에 특이적으로 결합하는 단일클론항체 및 이의 용도
patent.abstract: La présente invention concerne une protéine NS1 de recombinaison dérivée du virus de la fièvre jaune, un anticorps monoclonal se liant de manière spécifique à celle-ci, et une utilisation associée. La protéine NS1 de recombinaison selon la présente invention peut mesurer un anticorps dans un échantillon spécifique de la protéine avec une sensibilité élevée et une grande précision. L'invention concerne également un kit qui comprend la protéine, l'anticorps se liant de manière spécifique à celle-ci, et similaire peut détecter rapidement et facilement un anticorps contre le virus de la fièvre jaune dans un échantillon par catégorisation de l'anticorps en IgM ou IgG et, par conséquent, peut être largement utilisé pour vérifier si une infection à la fièvre jaune a eu lieu, si une vaccination est réussie, et similaire.

patent.title: Led 램프 모듈
patent.abstract: The present invention relates to an LED lamp module, which is included in an LED lamp technology field. The LED lamp module comprises a heat dissipating substrate, wherein a plurality of heat dissipating fins are provided on a bottom surface of the heat dissipating substrate, and an LED lamp panel is provided on an upper surface thereof. Also, an outer circumference of the LED lamp panel is surrounded by a sealing washer hermetically connected to a sidewall of the LED lamp panel and an upper surface of the heat dissipating substrate, separately, and a fixing frame having a plurality of catching grooves formed at the outside is provided at an outer circumference of the sealing washer. In addition, a light transmitting plate having a fixing member is provided at an upper portion of the LED lamp panel. The fixing member includes a hollow frame, wherein the frame covers a side of the light transmitting plate, a plurality of catching pieces are provided on the frame, the catching pieces match the catching grooves, and a catching sawtooth caught by and coupled to a side portion of the bottom surface of the heat dissipating substrate is provided at a bottom side portion of the catching pieces. According to the present invention, airtightness is effectively ensured through a structure of the sealing washer and the fixing frame, and a waterproof effect is ensured.

patent.title: Apparatus and method for setting up communication relationship
patent.abstract: La présente invention fournit un procédé permettant d'établir une relation de communication, qui inclut les étapes suivantes consistant à : A. un nœud de relais déterminant qu'une nouvelle cellule voisine a été trouvée, obtenir les informations de la nouvelle cellule voisine, et rapporter les mêmes à une station de base donneur DeNB à laquelle elle appartient ; et B. le DeNB trouvant un nœud de réseau auquel la nouvelle cellule voisine appartient, déterminer si une interface X2 est établie entre elle et le nœud de réseau auquel la nouvelle cellule voisine appartient, et dans le cas contraire, établir l'interface X2 avec le nœud de réseau auquel la nouvelle cellule voisine appartient. Grâce au procédé fourni par la présente invention, il est réalisé que le nœud de relais peut communiquer avec le nœud de réseau auquel le nouveau nœud voisin appartient par l'intermédiaire du DeNB. De plus, sur cette base, il peut également être réalisé que lorsque les informations de configuration et/ou les informations de charge du nœud de relais sont changées, le nœud voisin est notifié de manière opportune par l'intermédiaire du DeNB, et lorsque les informations de configuration et/ou les informations de charge du nœud voisin sont changées, le nœud de relais est notifié de manière opportune par l'intermédiaire du DeNB.

patent.title: Method for soft-demodulation and soft-modulation of multi-antenna system
patent.abstract:
본 발명은 다중안테나 시스템의 소프트 복조 및 소프트 변조 방법에 관한 것으로, 보다 구체적으로는 고레벨 직교진폭변조 중 소프트 복조와 소프트 변조의 빠른 구현 방법은 고레벨의 QAM(직교진폭변조)를 이용하여 변조하는 고속 데이터 전송 이동통신 방법에 관한 것이다.   
     본 발명은 상기 소프트 복조의 구현 방법은 빠른 룩업테이블 방법을 이용하며, 이는 먼저 소프트 복조에 사용되는 룩업테이블을 생성하여 저장하고, 채널계수를 근거로 수신된 신호와 노이즈의 분산(variance)에 대하여 정상화(normalization) 처리를 진행하고, 정상화처리된 수신 신호를 양자화(quantization)하여, 양자화된 후의 신호에 대해 룩업테이블 또는 룩업테이블에 인터폴레이션(interpolation)을 결합한 방법을 진행하여 룩업테이블 후 얻어진 값에 정상화시킨 노이즈 분산을 곱하여 필요한 비트의 우도비(LR)를 얻는 단계를 포함하며, 고레벨 직교진폭변조 중의 소프트변조방법은 비트 우도비를 전환하여 계산하되, 자연 QAM 맵핑되는 부호와 비트의 리니어 관계에 따라, 비트의 평균치와 분산을 근거로 부호의 평균치와 분산을 계산하는 단계를 포함한다. 
       
     직교주파수다중분할(OFDM), 동기화 방법, 블록 전송시스템

patent.title: Vacuum foaming equipment and method for refrigerator cabinet
patent.abstract: 본발명은 냉장고 캐비닛 진공발포장치 및 방법에 관한 것으로, 냉장고 캐비닛 진공발포장치 하부에 설치되는 하부프레임(201), 상기 하부프레임(201)의 양측면에 설치되는 측면프레임(202)으로 구성되는 고정프레임(200)과; 상기 하부프레임(201) 상면에 설치되는 베이스프레임(204)과; 상기 고정프레임(200)에 결합되는 진공발포 케이스;를 포함하는 진공발포장치에 있어서, 상기 진공발포 케이스는 전면판(10), 후면판(20), 상부판(30), 상기 베이스프레임(204) 상부에 설치되는 하부판(40), 양 측면판(50)으로 이루어지고, 상기 베이스프레임(204)의 하부에는 측면판 간격조절모터(51)가 설치되어 양 측면판(50)의 간격을 조절할 수 있으며, 베이스프레임(204)의 하부에는 베이스프레임(204)을 승하강시키는 승강실린더(41)가 설치되어 있으며, 후면판(20)에는 믹싱헤드(21)가 결합되며, 전면판(10) 후방에는 전후이동이 가능한 전면압착판(11)이 결합되어 있어서 상기 전면압착판(11)이 전면판(10)으로부터 후방으로 이동하여 제품발포지그 공간을 형성하고 제품발포지그의 전면을 밀봉하는 것이며, 또한 본발명은 냉장고 캐비닛 진공발포방법에 있어서, 냉장고 캐비닛 제품 형상의  제품 발포지그를 포함하는 냉장고 캐비닛 진공발포지그는 진공 챔버역할을 하고, 반응성 혼합물을 냉장고 캐비닛 제품 발포지그 내부로 공급하기 전에 상기 진공 챔버 내에 진공을 발생시키는 것으로, 본발명은 냉장고 캐비닛 진공발포장치의 진공챔버 및 제품발포지그 공간 내부를 진공으로 만들어 발포액을 주입하고 발포함으로써, 폼(foam)의 팽창 및 상승 단계가 상당히 가속되며, 상대적으로 짧은 시간 내에 캐비닛의 중공벽들의 완벽한 충진이 되는 현저한 효과가 있다.

patent.title: 부욕수 조성물 및 이의 제조방법
patent.abstract: The present invention relates to a water composition for a floating bath and a manufacturing method thereof, comprising the steps of: adding, into a reaction container, an acid and powdered stone including 5 to 20 wt% of vermiculite, 10 to 30 wt% of celestite, 10 to 20 wt% of paigeite, 10 to 40 wt% of barley stone, 10 to 40 wt% of sphalerite, and 10 to 40 wt% of dolomite, wherein the acid solution is 3 to 5 times the weight of the total weight of the powdered stone, and leaching minerals contained in the powdered stone by heating; producing high-concentration liquid via magnetic treatment and ultrasonic treatment after lowering the temperature of the solution having the minerals leached; and making the pH thereof 5.5 to 7.0 and specific gravity thereof 1.2 to 1.4 by adding water and a chelating agent. The water composition for a floating bath manufactured through the steps enhances the effect of a floating bath by maximizing the absorption of the minerals into a human body as enough minerals are leached from the natural powdered stone, and is good to skin and has excellent effects on fatigue recovery because toxins and impurities are discharged from the human body.

patent.title: A finger pinch protective hinge and Door structure with these
patent.abstract:
본 발명은 문과 문틀 사이에 손가락의 끼임현상으로 발생하는 안전사고를 미연에 방지하고자 이루어진 손가락 끼임 보호용 경첩과 이를 구비한 방문 구조에 관한 기술이다. 
본 발명인 손가락 끼임 보호용 경첩은, 문과 문틀을 연결하도록 한쌍의 측면연결판을 구비한 경첩에 있어서, 상기 측면연결판 중 적어도 어느 하나의 측면연결판에는 공간형성을 위한 공간연결판을 구비하여 문이 닫힘시 한쌍의 측면연결판 사이에 손가락 보호를 위한 스트레치 유닛이 설치될 수 있는 스트레치 유닛용 공간부가 형성되도록 이루어지며, 이러한 손가락 끼임 보호용 경첩을 구비한 방문구조는, 상기 제시된 손가락 끼임 보호용 경첩의 사용되어 문이 닫혔을 때, 상기 경첩에 의하여 문과 문틀 사이에 스트레치 유닛용 공간부가 형성되고, 상기  스트레치 유닛용 공간부는 문 또는 문틀에 설치된 스트레치 유닛으로 채워지도록 이루어진다. 
이와 같이 이루어진 방문구조의 경우 문이 열렸다 닫히는 과정에서 손가락이 문과 문틀 사이에 끼여지더라도 부상을 입지 않게 된다.

patent.title: Liquid crystal compound containing difluormethoxy bridge, composition and application thereof
patent.abstract: The invention relates to a liquid crystal compound having the structure of formula I wherein R is selected from the group consisting of H and alkyl or alkoxy groups of 1 to 12 carbon atoms in which one or more H are unsubstituted or substituted with halogen; A 1  is selected from the group consisting of a single bond or a 1,4-phenylene group in which each H in the 1,4-phenylene group is independently substituted by one or more halogen atoms; L 1  and L 2  are each independently selected from H or halogen; Z 1  is a single bond or —(CH 2 ) 2 —. The compound has advantages of low rotational viscosity, large dielectric anisotropy, good mutual solubility and stability, which can be added to LC composition to reduce the driving voltage of the display. Thus, the novel compound has prosperous applications in LCD industry.

patent.title: Method of and system for performing access control and radio resource management entity
patent.abstract: The present invention discloses a method of and system for performing the access control as well as a radio resource management entity. The method includes: detecting, by a hybrid radio resource management entity, an access control trigger event; determining, by the hybrid radio resource management entity, a non-closed subscriber group, CSG, User Equipment to be removed; disconnecting, by the hybrid radio resource management entity, the connection with the non-CSG User Equipment to be removed. In accordance with the present invention, a hybrid radio resource management entity is able to control the access of User Equipment, so as to guarantee the access of CSG User Equipment.

patent.title: Procédé de transfert intercellulaire prenant en charge une mobilité de terminal
patent.abstract: Un procédé de transfert intercellulaire permettant de prendre en charge une mobilité de terminal est fourni. Avant qu'un nœud de réseau cœur cible ne mette à jour des informations de support selon une station de base cible vers laquelle un équipement utilisateur (UE) exécute le transfert intercellulaire, une procédure de détermination de contrôle d'accès est ajoutée. Selon les informations de détermination de contrôle d'accès fournies par la station de base cible, s'il est déterminé que le support prenant en charge un service SIPTO (décharge de trafic IP sélectionné) ou LIPA (accès IP local) a la permission d'exécuter le transfert intercellulaire, le nœud de réseau cœur cible met à jour les informations de support. S'il est déterminé que le support prenant en charge le service SIPTO ou LIPA n'est pas autorisé à exécuter le transfert intercellulaire, l'échec de transfert intercellulaire est notifié concernant le support non autorisé à exécuter le transfert intercellulaire, et les informations de support ne sont pas mises à jour, réduisant ainsi la ressource de signalisation et la ressource sans fil gaspillées. En variante, durant le transfert intercellulaire vers le réseau cible par l'UE ou après le transfert intercellulaire vers le réseau cible, la libération ou la désactivation du support est exécutée pour le support non autorisé à exécuter le transfert intercellulaire, de telle sorte que l'UE peut recommencer le processus d'établissement de support concernant le support non autorisé à exécuter le transfert intercellulaire ; un support optimisé est ainsi établi et la qualité de service (QoS) est assurée.

patent.title: RF chain usage in a dual network architecture
patent.abstract: An apparatus and method for using a radio frequency (RF chain) in a dual-network architecture are disclosed herein. An evolved node B (eNodeB) receives RF chain sharing information from user equipment (UE) associated with the eNodeB. The RF chain sharing information comprises indication of a non-usable frequency band or indication of which frequency band is supported for each of a first network and a second network that an RF chain is switchable between. The RF chain is included in the UE and at least a frequency band is shared between the first and second networks. The eNodeB transmits radio resource control (RRC) connection reconfiguration signaling to the UE to release a secondary cell (SCell) or perform inter-frequency handover of a primary cell (PCell) in response to the RF chain sharing information.

patent.title: 토큰 분리 및 번역 과정을 통합한 통합 디코딩 장치 및 그 방법
patent.abstract: La présente invention se rapporte à un appareil de décodage intégré qui intègre des procédés de catégorisation et d'interprétation de jetons et à un procédé associé et, en particulier, au décodage intégré d'une catégorisation et d'une interprétation simultanées de jetons au cours du décodage de séquences de texte en entrée, afin de générer et de réduire des erreurs de traduction et d'obtenir ainsi des résultats d'interprétation optimaux.

patent.title: Method and apparatus for interference-aware resource-sharing scheme for multiple D2D group communications underlaying cellular networks
patent.abstract: A method and apparatus for an interference-aware resource-sharing scheme for multiple D2D group communications is provided. The method for interference-aware resource-sharing scheme for multiple D2D communications includes initializing a D2D communication request and deciding the numbers of D2D pairs and CUEs, grouping D2D pairs according to the decided numbers of the D2D pairs and CUEs, selecting target CUEs for the grouped D2D pairs to share frequency resources, applying interference alignment to the D2D groups, updating the set of the CUEs and D2D pairs, and moving the rest of the D2D pairs to the orthogonal group.

patent.title: Method for supporting continuous reception of evolved broadcast and multicast service data
patent.abstract: The method for supporting continuous reception of enhanced broadcast service data comprising steps of: an MCE receiving an “MBMS Session Start Request” message from a core network; after the MCE receives the message, transmitting a response message to the core network; MCE transmitting an “MBMS Session Start Request” message to an ENB, the message including information of adjacent cells; and the ENB broadcasting the information of adjacent cells on a current cells. With the scheme of present invention, if a user wants to move to a common cell when he/she receives MBMS service in an SFN edge cell, he/she can enter the active mode and switch into the common cell so as to reduce MBMS data loss. When a UE moves from a cell with SC-PTM transmission mode into a cell with SC-PTM transmission mode, data loss can also be reduced.

patent.title: Multifunctional optical fiber fixing clamp
patent.abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of optical fiber cutting and welding, especially a multi-functional optical fiber fixing clamp. The multi-functional optical fiber fixing clamp of the invention comprises a clamp body and a clamp cover. One side of the said clamp body is pin jointed to the said clamp cover. The said clamp body is arranged with a first fiber loading slot and a fiber connector locating slot. The said clamp cover is arranged with a first abutting structure which is abutted with the said first fiber loading slot and a second abutting structure which is abutted with the said fiber connector locating slot. Compared with the existing technology, the multi-functional optical fiber fixing clamp of the invention can match with SC optical fiber connector, LC optical fiber connector, rubber-insulated fiber cable and wire jumper. As the clamp has the compatibility function, operators are not required to change clamp during a series of operations such as optical fiber cutting and welding. Thus, working time is greatly saved and work efficiency is improved.

patent.title: Receiver with proximity sensor and method of making the same
patent.abstract: The present invention relates to a rectangular audio receiver assembly integrated with a proximity-illuminance sensor, which has a size and volume minimized by integration of a receiver and the proximity-illuminance sensor embedded therein which can reduce production costs by simplifying manufacturing processes; and to a method to manufacture the same. The audio receiver assembly of the present invention comprises: an audio module which receives an audio signal and vibrates a diaphragm to output a sound; a proximity-illuminance sensor module which includes an IR generating element and a light receiving element combined to a frame of the audio module, detects the intensity of the surrounding light, and detects an approaching object; and a cover module combined to the frame of the of the audio module to provide an audio path for the embedded audio module and an optical path for the proximity-illuminance sensor module, and protects the internal components. The proximity-illuminance sensor module includes: a substrate to accommodate the IR generating element and the light receiving element; an IR LED mounted on the substrate to emit infrared light; an ASIC mounted on the substrate, including the light receiving element receiving the intensity of the surrounding light, and the IR light emitted from the IR LED reflected by the external objects; an IR LED mold having a lens to increase light emitting efficiency covering the IR LED; and an ASIC molding transfer having a lens to increase light receiving efficiency covering the ASIC.

patent.title: Data synchronization method and system
patent.abstract: La présente invention concerne un procédé et un système de synchronisation de données. Le procédé comporte les étapes suivantes : un premier dispositif ajoute un horodatage à un paquet de données reçu et transmet le paquet de données à un deuxième dispositif ; le deuxième dispositif détermine une période de transmission à laquelle appartient le paquet de données en fonction de l'horodatage du paquet de données et transmet des paquets de données de différents services appartenant à la même période de transmission en utilisant des ressources radio correspondant à la période de transmission après que les paquets de données des différents services appartenant à la même période de transmission ont été multiplexés. Le schéma technique de la présente invention permet d'utiliser pleinement les ressources radio.

patent.title: Partially and fully earth-anchored cable-stayed bridges using main-span  prestressing unit and method of constructing the same
patent.abstract: Provided are partially and fully earth-anchored cable-stayed bridges, each of which uses a prestressing unit including anchor units and a prestressing member from deck segments installed at its main span such that the prestressing unit serves as a conventional windproof cable and can simultaneously introduce a tensile stress. Thereby, a magnitude of the maximum compressive stress acting on a cross section of each main-span deck segment is reduced, so that it is possible to reduce a cross-sectional area of each main-span deck segment and thus to ensure economical construction. All or part of the compressive stress generated at the main span can be offset by the tensile stress caused by the prestressing member.

patent.title: Method of manufacturing concrete carpet composite structure and concrete carpet thereby
patent.abstract: The present invention relates to a method for preparing a concrete carpet composite and a concrete carpet composite prepared thereby. The method comprises: a powder preparing step of previously preparing a concrete mixture powder; a concrete mixture powder supplying step of installing a supply port (5) for a concrete mixture powder in an upper part of one side of the bottom layer (1), supplying the concrete mixture powder through the supply port such that the concrete mixture powder is uniformly distributed on the bottom layer (1), thereby forming a concrete mixture powder layer (2) on an upper surface of the bottom layer (1); a fiber layer coating step of coating a fiber layer (3) on the concrete mixture powder layer (2) while the bottom layer (1) is moved; and a connective fiber forming step of, with respect to the moving bottom layer (1), the concrete mixture powder layer (2), and the fiber layer (3), sticking a plurality of needles from the top of the fiber layer (3) and pulling out the needles after the arrival of the bottom layer (1), thereby allowing a portion of a fiber yarn of the fiber layer (3) to be formed as a fiber yarn that connects the fiber layer (3) and the bottom layer (1). Therefore, the present invention provides: a method for preparing a concrete carpet composite, which is solidified by moisture at a high rate to form a concrete layer with a predetermined shape; and a concrete carpet composite prepared thereby.

patent.title: Performing a handover in a heterogeneous wireless network
patent.abstract: Technology for performing a handover in a heterogeneous wireless network (HetNet) is disclosed. One method comprises receiving, at an anchor serving cell in the HetNet, channel measurement reports made by a user equipment (UE) for a plurality of cells. A transmission point change request can be sent, based on the channel measurements for the UE, from the anchor serving cell to a target transmission point. The target transmission point is located in one of the plurality of cells. A transmission point change indicator is sent from the anchor cell to the UE to indicate a change in TP with which the UE will communicate via an air interface, while maintaining a connection to the anchor serving cell.

patent.title: 3D face model reconstruction apparatus and method
patent.abstract: Apparatuses, methods and storage medium associated with 3D face model reconstruction are disclosed herein. In embodiments, an apparatus may include a facial landmark detector, a model fitter and a model tracker. The facial landmark detector may be configured to detect a plurality of landmarks of a face and their locations within each of a plurality of image frames. The model fitter may be configured to generate a 3D model of the face from a 3D model of a neutral face, in view of detected landmarks of the face and their locations within a first one of the plurality of image frames. The model tracker may be configured to maintain the 3D model to track the face in subsequent image frames, successively updating the 3D model in view of detected landmarks of the face and their locations within each of successive ones of the plurality of image frames. In embodiments, the facial landmark detector may include a face detector, an initial facial landmark detector, and one or more facial landmark detection linear regressors. Other embodiments may be described and/or claimed.

patent.title: Method for requesting an unregistered UE to perform registration in the IMS
patent.abstract: The method for requesting an Internet Multimedia Sub-system (IMS) unregistered User Equipment (UE) to perform IMS registration including initiating an IMS domain session or sending an IMS relevant signaling to a called subscriber by a UE A; informing the UE A information that the called subscriber has not registered with the IMS by the network; requesting the called terminal to conduct IMS registration by the UE A; and restarting the IMS session after the called terminal completes the IMS registration. An IMS unregistered UE can also perform IMS service.
